TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataControlField extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class DataControlField Implements IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor, IStateManager
public ref class DataControlField abstract : System::Web::UI::IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type DataControlField = class interface IStateManager interface IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor

summary.span: 用作所有数据控件字段类型的基类，这些类型表示表格格式的数据绑定控件（例如 和 ）中的数据列。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all data control field types, which represent a column of data in tabular data-bound controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作基类的所有数据控件字段类型。The class serves as the base class for all data control field types. 数据控件字段由数据绑定控件，以表示字段的数据，类似于如何对象表示的类型中的列控件。Data control fields are used by data-bound controls to represent a field of data, similar to how a object represents a type of column in the control. 使用派生自类来控制数据的字段的显示方式中的数据绑定控件如或。Use the classes that are derived from to control how a field of data is displayed in a data-bound control such as or . 下表列出了由 ASP.NET 提供的不同的数据控件字段类型。The following table lists the different data control field types provided by ASP.NET. |列字段类型Column field type|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||数据源中字段的值显示为文本。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||数据绑定控件中显示命令按钮。Displays a command button in a data-bound control. 具体取决于控件，这样您可以显示具有自定义按钮控件，例如添加或删除按钮的列或行。Depending on the control, this allows you to display either a row or a column with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||数据绑定控件中显示一个复选框。Displays a check box in a data-bound control. 此数据控件字段类型通常用于显示具有一个布尔值的字段。This data control field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||显示内置命令按钮以执行编辑、 插入或删除数据绑定控件中的操作。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in a data-bound control.| ||数据源中字段的值显示为超链接。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 此数据控件字段类型允许您将第二个字段绑定到超链接的 URL。This data control field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||数据绑定控件中显示图像。Displays an image in a data-bound control.| ||显示用户定义内容根据指定的模板数据绑定控件中。Displays user-defined content in a data-bound control according to a specified template.| 您还可以扩展和类来创建您自己的数据控件字段类型。You can also extend the and classes to create your own data control field types. 类提供了很多属性，以确定用户界面 (UI) 元素中的数据绑定控件的呈现方式。The class provides many properties that determine how user interface (UI) elements are presented in the data-bound control. 在呈现 UI 时，不是每个控件使用每个可用的数据控件字段属性。Not every control uses every available data control field property when rendering a UI. 例如，控件，将数据控件字段显示为行，包括每个数据控件字段的标题项，但没有页脚项。For example, the control, which displays the data control fields as rows, includes a header item for each data control field, but no footer item. 因此，并属性将忽略控件。Therefore, the and properties are ignored by the control. 控件，但是，使用并属性如果属性设置为`true`。The control, however, uses the and properties if the property is set to `true`. 同样，数据控件字段属性会影响具体取决于该元素是 UI 元素的演示文稿。Similarly, the data control field properties affect the presentation of UI elements depending on what the element is. 属性始终应用于字段。The property is always applied to the field. 如果该类型派生自包含一个控件，如或类，属性应用于字段。If the type derived from contains a control, as in the or classes, the property is applied to the field. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用并对象，派生自，以显示行在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 控件具有属性设置为`false`，这使它能够显示返回的数据的子集属性。The control has the property set to `false`, which enables it to display a subset of the data returned by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/CS/datacontrolfield1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/VB/datacontrolfield1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类，以创建可在自定义绑定的字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a custom bound field that can be used in a control. 类似于类，`RadioButtonField`类表示的列`true`或`false`数据。Similar to the class, the `RadioButtonField` class represents a column of `true` or `false` data. 但是，尽管数据的类绑定到可以是任何组的`true`或`false`值的数据集的`RadioButtonField`类绑定到只能有一个`true`在任何给定时间的值。However, although the data that the class is bound to can be any set of `true` or `false` values, the set of data that the `RadioButtonField` class is bound to can have only one `true` value at any given time. 此示例演示如何实现并方法，派生自的所有类的两个重要方法。This example demonstrates how to implement the and methods, two important methods of all classes derived from . [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`RadioButtonField`类，该类提供在上一示例中，在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `RadioButtonField` class, which is provided in the previous example, in a control. 在此示例中，控件显示体育团队的数据。In this example, the control displays data for a sports team. 包括一个 ID 列、 运动员姓名列和标识团队的负责人，则返回 true 或 false 的列的数据表中维护的玩家数据。The player data is maintained in a data table that includes an ID column, columns for the player names, and a true or false column that identifies the captain of the team. `RadioButtonField`类用于显示哪个团队成员是当前团队负责人。The `RadioButtonField` class is used to display which team member is the current team captain. 可以编辑控件，以选择新的团队负责人或更改播放机的其他信息。The control can be edited to choose a new team captain or to change other player information. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4/CS/datacontrolfield4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4/VB/datacontrolfield4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用以引发状态更改事件时属性设置。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 获取 对象所包含的任何 Web 服务器控件的样式。

span.span: Gets the style of any Web server controls contained by the object.

value.span: 一个 ，控制字段所包含的 Web 服务器控件的外观。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of Web server controls contained by the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制的类型派生自所包含的任何 Web 服务器控件的外观。The property governs the appearance of any Web server controls contained by types derived from . 此属性不会影响所有派生的类型。This property does not affect all derived types. 控件，它通常显示的文本数据，并仅包含控件，仅受属性中时在状态。The control, which typically displays text data and contains only controls, is only affected by the property when in state. Web 服务器控件，如并可能会受到属性，具体取决于字段所包含的控件对象实例的特定配置。Web server controls such as and might be affected by the property, depending on the specific configuration of the control object instances contained by the field. 例如，控件可以作为呈现， ，或对象。For example, the control can be rendered as a , , or object. 尽管控制受`font`特性指定的对象，控件不是。Although a control is affected by `font` attributes of the specified object, a control is not. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用并对象，派生自，以显示行在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 的属性对象设置和控制如何显示字段所包含的控件。The property of the object is set and governs how the control contained by the field is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/CS/datacontrolfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/VB/datacontrolfield2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从当前表格单元格中提取数据控件字段的值，并将该值添加到指定的 集合中。

span.span: Extracts the value of the data control field from the current table cell and adds the value to the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由派生自的类型实现将当前字段相关联的一个值，如果适用。The method is implemented by types derived from to associate the current field with a value, if applicable. 字段/值对存储在`dictionary`传递给方法的集合。The field/value pair is stored in the `dictionary` collection that is passed to the method. 调用方法`ExtractRowValues`方法的数据控件，如和。The method is called by the `ExtractRowValues` method of data controls such as and . 此方法时要编写自定义数据绑定控件调用使用对象来组合一组单元格和相关联的值。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to assemble a set of cells and their associated values. 实现此方法，编写派生自的类时，它显示用户数据绑定的数据。Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from that displays user data or data-bound data. 并非所有派生的类型实现方法，因为并非所有字段都显示用户数据。Not all derived types implement the method, because not all fields display user data. 例如，控件显示一个按钮，并没有任何用户数据。For example, the control displays a button and has no user data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现派生的控件的方法类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method for a control that derives from the class. `RadioButtonField`类呈现数据绑定单选按钮中的每一行控件。The `RadioButtonField` class renders a data-bound radio button for every row in a control. 当方法调用时，该方法会尝试确定是否的当前值单元格中包含的对象已选中或清除，并且将值添加到集合。When the method is called, the method attempts to determine whether the current value of the object contained in the cell is selected or cleared, and adds the value to the collection. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据控件字段脚注的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the footer of the data control field.

value.span: 一个 ，控制 的脚注项外观。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of the footer item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制从派生的类型的脚注项中显示任何文本的外观。The property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the footer item of a type derived from . > [!NOTE] > 一些数据绑定控件不呈现数据控件字段脚注项。Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field. 例如，控制其数据控件字段显示为行。For example, the control displays its data control fields as rows. 脚注项不呈现这些数据控件字段。A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields. 这些控件中将忽略属性。The property is ignored in these controls.

value.span: 一个在 的脚注项中显示的字符串。

span.span: A string that is displayed in the footer item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用与字段相关的属性来将注释添加到数据控件字段，或对其他数据。Use the property to add notes or comments to a data control field, or for other data related to the field. > [!NOTE] > 一些数据绑定控件不呈现数据控件字段脚注项。Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field. 例如，控制其数据控件字段显示为行。For example, the control displays its data control fields as rows. 脚注项不呈现这些数据控件字段。A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields. 这些控件中将忽略属性。The property is ignored in these controls. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 获取或设置数据控件字段的标题项中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed in the header item of a data control field.

value.span: 一个表示图像的完全限定或相对 URL 的字符串，该图像在 的标题项中显示。

span.span: A string that represents a fully qualified or relative URL to an image that is displayed in the header item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性时所需的标头项的数据控件而不是标头文本中显示的图像。Set the property when you want an image displayed in the header item of a data control instead of header text. > [!NOTE] > 如果这两个并设置的属性，属性具有的优先级。If both the and properties are set, the property has precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置的属性列，该列中显示图像而不是标头文本的控件的列标题。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a column, which displays an image in the control's column header instead of header text. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/CS/datacontrolfield3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/VB/datacontrolfield3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据控件字段标头的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the header of the data control field.

value.span: 一个控制 标题项外观的 。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of the header item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制从派生的类型的标题项中显示任何文本的外观。The property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the header item of a type derived from . 最常见的应用属性是更改中的列标题的样式控件。The most common application of the property is to alter the style of the column headers in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置的属性列，显示列标题中的黄色背景颜色控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a column, which displays a yellow background color for the column header in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/CS/datacontrolfield3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/VB/datacontrolfield3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据控件字段的标题项中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header item of a data control field.

value.span: 一个在 的标题项中显示的字符串。

span.span: A string that is displayed in the header item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性用来标识数据控件中的字段的友好名称。Use the property to identify a field in a data control with a friendly name. 最常见的应用属性将提供有意义的列名中的数据绑定字段或控件。The most common application of the property is to provide meaningful column names for data-bound fields in a or control. > [!NOTE] > 如果这两个并设置的属性，属性具有的优先级。If both the and properties are set, the property has precedence. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置的属性列的列标题中显示文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the properties of columns to display text in the column headers of a control. 此代码示例演示在其中的母版-详细信息方案控件用于显示时的数据的子集控件用于显示一组更大的数据并插入新记录。This code example demonstrates a master-details scenario in which a control is used to display a subset of data while the control is used to display a larger set of data and insert new records. 该示例使用两个控件： 一个用于填充控件，另一个用于填充控制和插入数据。The example uses two controls: one to populate the control and one to populate the control and insert data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

The data control that owns the .

summary.span: 为数据控件字段执行基础实例初始化。

span.span: Performs basic instance initialization for a data control field.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的对象是否与调用相关联方法以初始化该字段添加到行集合之前。The control that the object is associated with calls the method to initialize the field before it is added to a rows collection. 数据控件，如并调用中的方法及其`CreateChildControls`方法之前调用其他方法如`CreateRow`使用数据创建的特定行。Data controls such as and call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before calling other methods such as `CreateRow` to create specific rows with data. 此方法时要编写自定义数据绑定控件调用使用对象执行的任何基本初始化对象。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for any objects. 实现此方法，如果您的派生的类型需要的任何对象初始化之前它将填充对象的数据，或在控件中方法。Implement this method if your derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

summary.span: 将文本或控件添加到单元格的控件集合中。

span.span: Adds text or controls to a cell's controls collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型派生自实现方法以添加文本和控件添加到属于使用表来显示用户界面 (UI) 的数据控件的对象。Types derived from implement the method to add text and controls to a object that belongs to a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI). 这些数据控件创建完整的表结构逐行时其各自`CreateChildControls`调用方法。These data controls create the complete table structure row by row when their respective `CreateChildControls` methods are called. 调用方法`InitializeRow`方法的数据控件，如和。The method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as and . 此方法时要编写自定义数据绑定控件调用使用对象来初始化数据或控件的表结构的单元格。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls. 实现此方法，编写派生自的类时。Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现派生的控件的方法类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method for a control that derives from the class. `RadioButtonField`类呈现数据绑定单选按钮中的每一行控件。The `RadioButtonField` class renders a data-bound radio button for every row in a control. 当该行向用户显示数据，并且不处于编辑模式，控件处于禁用状态。When the row is displaying data to a user and is not in edit mode, the control is disabled. 当行处于编辑模式，例如，当用户选择要更新中的行控件，控件将呈现为启用，以便可以单击它。When the row is in edit mode, for example when the user chooses to update a row in the control, the control is rendered as enabled so that it can be clicked. 此示例使用按位 AND 运算符，因为行状态可能是一个或多个组合值。This example uses bitwise AND operators, because the row state might be a combination of one or more values. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件处于插入模式时的状态当前显示行是。A data-bound control is in insert mode when the state of the current display row is . 控制检查此属性的值，然后它将呈现的一组字段。The control checks the value of this property before it renders a set of fields. 如果属性是`false`，则的属性对象设置为`false`。If the property is `false`, the property of the object is set to `false`. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制派生自的类型显示的任何文本数据的外观。The property governs the appearance of any text data displayed by a type derived from . 例如，绑定控件的文本数据，您可以使用属性来更改显示的文本的外观。For example, when you bind a control to text data, you can use the property to alter the appearance of the text that is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置上的属性用来显示对象`FirstName`并`LastName`中的数据控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property on the objects used to display `FirstName` and `LastName` data in a control. 控件具有属性设置为`false`，这使它能够显示返回的数据的子集属性。The control has the property set to `false`, which enables it to display a subset of the data returned by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/CS/datacontrolfield1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/VB/datacontrolfield1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将数据源视图还原为保存过的前一视图状态。

span.span: Restores the data source view's previously saved view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 此方法将还原的视图状态信息中保存的上一个页请求对象方法。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnFieldChanged ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnFieldChanged() cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnFieldChanged ()
protected: virtual void OnFieldChanged();
abstract member OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将引发的事件信号的对象的状态已更改。The method raises an event signaling that the object's state has changed. 对以下属性的更改会导致引发此事件： ， ， ， ， ，并。Changes to the following properties cause this event to be raised: , , , , , and . 派生的类型属性也会引发此事件发生状态更改时。Derived type properties also raise this event when state changes occur. Web 服务器控件，如并通常情况下调用`DataBind`中的字段的响应的方法更改事件。Web server controls such as and typically call the `DataBind` method in response to a field change event. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual object SaveViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: virtual System::Object ^ SaveViewState();
abstract member SaveViewState : unit -> obj override this.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存在页回发到服务器后对 视图状态所做的更改。

span.span: Saves the changes made to the view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的对象。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与此对象关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是累积的服务器控件的属性的值。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后将保留到字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态时，一个字符串返回到客户端为存储在对应的 HTML 中的变量`hidden`元素。When view state is saved, a string is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element. 当你创作的自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的提高效率属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 视图状态概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法返回的值属性，如果设置该属性。This method is implemented to return the value of the property, if the property is set. 否则，此方法只需返回一个字符串，表示数据控件字段 (例如，"BoundField") 的类型。Otherwise, this method simply returns a string that represents the type of the data control field (for example, "BoundField").

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪对其视图状态所做的更改，以便这些更改可以存储在控件的 属性中并且能够在同一页的不同请求间得以保持。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the control's property and persisted across requests for the same page.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，发出信号表示字段所包含的控件支持回调。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, signals that the controls contained by a field support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用来确定控件是否包含在一个帮助器方法对象支持回调。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 已实现此方法的基实现引发异常以指示不支持回调。The base implementation of this method has been implemented to throw a exception to indicate that callbacks are not supported. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: 在 类的默认实例上调用此方法。

span.span: The method is called on a default instance of the class.

para.span: 派生的类类可以重写此方法，以指示是否通过字段支持回调所包含的控件。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，实现此方法作为空方法，不会引发异常;否则，使用有用的消息说明为什么不支持回调引发异常。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 一个 实例，包含 视图状态信息。

span.span: An instance of that contains the view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据控件字段的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A data control field's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要在 HTTP 请求间保留这些值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性，它是一个实例的类中，以存储属性值。To preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 值时来处理后续请求中作为变量传递到的 HTML 隐藏 input 元素。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed. 有关保存服务器控件视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 视图状态概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818). 默认情况下，启用所有服务器控件的视图状态，但有情况下时想要禁用它。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances when you will want to disable it. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 有关字典和如何使用它们的详细信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否呈现数据控件字段的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data control field is rendered.

value.span: 如果呈现 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is rendered; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来显示或隐藏数据绑定控件中的对象。Use the property to show or hide objects in a data-bound control. 如果属性是`false`，数据值不会显示，并且不要对客户端进行一次往返行程。If the property is `false`, the data values are not displayed and do not make a round-trip to the client. 如果希望保存/还原数据的一个字段，是不可见，请将添加到的字段名称`DataKeyNames`数据绑定控件的属性。If you want to round-trip the data for a field that is not visible, add the field name to the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用并对象，派生自，以显示行在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 的属性显示的对象`EmployeeID`列设置为`false`，并由不呈现列控件。The property of the object that displays the `EmployeeID` column is set to `false`, and the column is not rendered by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/CS/datacontrolfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/VB/datacontrolfield2vb.aspx#1)]
